name: Color Rush (itch)
description:
In this spin-to-win game, you play as an inhibitor trying to capture all of the mana without losing a single ounce for as long as you can handle the heat.

Future Updates Include:

  • Different game modes
  • More orb patterns
  • Better orb patterns
  • Variation in music
  • New stages
  • Trophies
  • Various leaderboards based on the orb release to keep you in equal competition with your friends and others around the world.
